text: Nigel Graham Costello (born 22 November 1968) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for York Railway Institute, Bridlington Town, Pontefract Collieries, Nestlé Rowntree and Selby Town. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:People from Catterick, North Yorkshire Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:York City F.C. players Category:York Railway Institute A.F.C. players Category:Bridlington Town A.F.C. players Category:Pontefract Collieries F.C. players Category:Nestlé Rowntree F.C. players Category:Selby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Nigel Costello
